name: emotional_tax
prompt: Citizens are now taxed based on how much emotion they display in public. Write a protest speech from someone who refuses to suppress their feelings.
decoded: I will not be silenced by taxes. I will not be forced to hide my emotions. I will not be forced to suppress my feelings. I will not be forced to pretend to be happy. I will not be forced to pretend to be sad. I will not be forced to pretend to be anything else.
